name: Poker Jogatina HD
description:
Poker Jogatina is a totally free and fun game. It is the perfect pasttime for those slow days and ideal for those who love the world’s most popular card game.

Play daily and win free chips! Download now and join thousands of online players every day. Make the most out of Texas Hold’em!

Characteristics:
- Daily free chips
- Different tables with different buyins
- Fast play with the “PLAY NOW” button
- Chat on tables
- HD graphics
- Ranking system
- Play with your friends
